description: And very fastest than other because it uses system storage!

I prefer an offline mode to manage my project. This is the best kanban style software available. I can sync my project files with google drive so that they are backed up and still they are under my control.
I love the look and feel. If I add a project though, I can't have it disappearing when I turn around. Same for workspaces. Please fix the bugs in your system and I would be happy to use this software
